title: Create a new team for a project in Notion
author: Will Stenzel
readme:
Creates a new team for a project from webhook form data. When the project is created the current semester is added to it's relation attribute.

  
More info can be found on using this workflow as part of a larger system [here](here).
readme_html:
Creates a new team for a project from webhook form data. When the project is created the current semester is added to it's relation attribute.


More info can be found on using this workflow as part of a larger system here.
readme_zh:
根据网页钩子表单数据为项目创建新团队。项目创建时，当前学期会被添加到其关联属性中。

更多关于如何将此工作流作为大型系统一部分使用的信息可[在此处](here)查阅。
title_zh: 在Notion中为项目创建一个新团队
